entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide "Left Handed" overloads of matrix create functions #80332
  • Aes-Gcm tags should support other sizes than 16 on macOS #80329
  • [API Proposal]: Improvements on `Queue<T>` and `Stack<T>` #80327

Closed

  • blazor - Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/utils/lock-free-alloc.c:145, condition `sb_header' not met, function:alloc_sb, Failed to allocate memory for the lock free allocator #60512
    8.0.0
  • TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration fails intermittently in CI #80277
  • CONTROL TEMPLATES CRASHING #80328
  • How to get millisecond in DataTable Date column? #80291
  • `Environment.GetFolderPath(ApplicationData)` returns empty string on linux under root account #79757
  • An `extern` method without a body causes its entire containing type to fail to load. #80300

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] clone the QueueUserAPC2 related definitions to not require 22621 Windows sdk #80333
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] amend the ABI for the tests: #80326
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Declare CoreClrPgoDataArg variable in CI script #80324
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2082284 #80322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80321
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • Increase timeout for TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration #80330
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • remove draft UUID section superseded by RFC 4122 #80320
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the building error for GenTreeIntrinsic. #80325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix failing official build #80316
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix alloc/dealloc mismatches and some buffer overruns found by ASAN #80189
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80274
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Mark Task.IsFaulted as ensuring that Task.Exception is non-null #80278
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for FreeBSD.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival > 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in aot->interp transitions #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • I can not install maui with dotnet 7 and VS 2022 17.4.0 preview 3.0 #28613

PullRequests

Created

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `scoped` keyword not included in completion list #66305
    17.5

Closed

  • Side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are preserved in generic code #66152
    17.6
  • CodeStyle options in Tools|Options showing up with some sort of ToString'ed version of our option type. #66291
    17.6
  • Make FixAll APIs for ContainingType/Member scope public #60029
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66304
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Ensure that side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66250
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Log source differences to files even when apply changes are blocked #66302
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Update publishData.json #66297
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Slow startup and navigation when debugging #45945
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #45944
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #45943
  • Configuring the DataProtection options via appsettings.json file #45942
  • Not able to asign a role to a newly created user (ASP.NET Identity) #45941
  • UserName and Email in Identity core #45938
  • Perf regression: https #45937
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #45936
  • Getting HTTP Error 503. with 0x800704e7 randomly #45934

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #45929
  • [Analyzer] Warn on ambiguous route patterns #45223
    8.0-preview1
  • IAsyncEnumerable buffer the results and not yield it as stream. #45916

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers

Merged

  • Add MVC ambiguous route analyzer #45915
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Improve loc of Win bundle installers #45927
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45559
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.3

Updated

  • Add infrastructure for RequestDelegateGenerator #45924
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2082245 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add Kestrel transports to solution filters #45933
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure
  • Using `JsonTypeInfo` to read request body in RDF #45932
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView has default spacing between items on Windows which I cannot remove #12495
  • CONTROL TEMPLATES CRASHING #12490
  • Blazor Web integration with MAUI / RCL / MAUI Class Library #12489

Closed

  • The app does not run after doing what was asked. It says the program "SampleApp.exe" exited with code 2147942405 #12493

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate IsEnabled to children #12488
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12486
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12260
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • - Simplify and fix flyout offset measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
